Frequently Asked Questions.

How do I create and run an .m file?
   1) a) Use another app to create a .m file with the script/function
         you want to use.
      or 
      b) Load the .m onto your sdcard or device.

   2) In Addi
      _cd locationofyourmfile_
      maybe this is 
      _cd /sdcard_ 

   3) In Addi
      a) if it is a script
         _nameoffilewithoutdotm_
      b) if it is a function
         _return = nameoffilewithoutdotm(arg1, arg2, etc)_
